name: Overwhelming
description:
You have to use the boxes to climb off the place that you are trapped, we mixed um First Person Shooter, Puzzle and Platform in our game.

It is a game submitted for Ludum Dare 41 Game Jam.

We hope you enjoy our game :).

//There is an EasterEgg hiding through the game!

The controls are
W - Foward /
A - Left /
S - Behind /
D - Right /
Left Mouse - Fire /
Space - Jump /
Esc - Pause /
